casebody.data:
No. 10-8561. Simon Banks, Petitioner v. Devon Brown, Director, District of Columbia Department of Corrections. 563 U.S. 958, 131 S. Ct. 2148,

179 L. Ed. 2d 932,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2838. April 18, 2011.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 1260, 131 S. Ct. 1580, 179 L. Ed. 2d 482, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 1850.
